favourite.article: They are both correct as they are two different songs ; )
@Carl: That's how I remember it. I thought it didn't look right. Thanks for sharing.
Thanks Carl - this is the way I learned this song.
Thank you for posting the original lyrics, Carl. Very much appreciated. (Webmaster: Please note that this song is still under copyright.)

Sharing the the original lyrics from Audrey Mieir:
His Name is Wonderful, His Name is Wonderful, His Name is Wonderful, Jesus my Lord.
He is the mighty King, Master of everything, His Name is Wonderful, Jesus my Lord.
He's the Great Shepherd, The Rock of all Ages, Almighty God is He, Bow down before Him, Love and adore Him, His Name is Wonderful, Jesus my Lord.
